_header: The first day of yule han we in mind
_description: A Christmas carol — eight quatrains (aaab) and 3-line burden: ‘Make we myrth / For crystes byrth / & syng we yole tyl candelmes’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
þe fyrst day of ȝole haue we in myndHow god was man born
                    of owr kynd…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…To shew hyr clen þat neue was fylyd& therwith endyth
                    crystmes
